key_themes.description: Give all the key themes or points discussed in the review in a list

summary.description: Give a brief summary of the review in 1 to 2 lines

sentiment.description: Return the sentiment of the review either as Positive, Negative or Neutral

pros.description: Give all the important pros in a list

cons.description: Extract review analysis. Include `cons` only if the text explicitly has a 'Cons' or 'Drawbacks' heading; otherwise return null.
